author: Emerson
content: A day is a miniature of eternity.

author: Napoleon
content: The man who has made up his mind to win will never say Impossible.

author: W. A. White
content: In education we are striving not to teach youth to make a living, but to make a life.

author: C. Weizmann
content: Miracles sometimes occur, but one has to work terribly for them.

author: Bob Brown
content: Behind every successful man there's a lot u unsuccessful years.

author: Samuel Johnson
content: Great works are performed not by strengh, but by perseverance.

author: F.W .Nietzsche
content: If you would go up high , then use your own legs ! Do not let yourselves carried aloft; do not seat yourselves on other people's backs and heads .

author: Benjamin Franklin
content: At twenty years of age , the will reigns; at thirty , the wit ; and at forty , the judgment .

author: Winston Churchill
content: I have nothing to offer but blood, boil, tears and sweat.

author: Francis Bacon
content: To choose time is to save time .
